comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Born Jessie Gregg in 1865, she married composer Edgar Stillman Kelley (note spelling) on 1891, in San Francisco. Jessie was also musical: she was involved in various organizations for music teachers, and headed the piano department at Western College for Women in Ohio. She was widowed in 1944. staff.lib.muohio.edu/westernarchives/kelley/wife-bio2.php

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks so much pennylrichardsca for providing the link to her archives.  This is great portrait of her, and we will correct the spelling of her married name the next time we update the record.
